translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Regarding the content in your official letter of the 4th of the current month, the Government orders to declare to you that when it gave orders to Captain Pedro Rodrigues de Quevedo to procure slaves and promote the tannery under his charge, it was under the persuasion that such establishment was outside the district entrusted to Your Lordship.

God keep Your Lordship.

Secretary of State of the Treasury Affairs, Piratini, April 11, 1838. Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter of the Most Excellent, April 11, received on the 19th of the same [month]. Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Commander of the Police of the Boqueirão District.
